name: gladys-hdmicec
description: The gladys-hdmicec module allows you to control the starting of your television with a simple HDMI connection.
instructionsHTML:
gladys-hdmicec

Installation

  • Instal library cec-utils :
    sudo aptitude install cec-utils
  • Add this module in Gladys and restart Gladys

Usage

Check the status of the TV :

gladys.modules.hdmicec.commands.isAlive();

Turn on the TV :

gladys.modules.hdmicec.commands.turnOnTv();

Turn off the TV :

gladys.modules.hdmicec.commands.turnOffTv();

### gladys-hdmicec

#### Installation

* Instal library cec-utils : 
```sudo aptitude install cec-utils```
* Add this module in Gladys and restart Gladys

#### Usage 

Check the status of the TV :
```
gladys.modules.hdmicec.commands.isAlive();
```
